name: Muscle Typer
description:
No guarantee the web version will actually work or perform well. Try refreshing the page, or download the native client.

"Muscle Typer" is a silly typing game made for Ludum Dare 45. Hastily uploaded. Poorly tested.

Instructions: Type the words and press enter when done. Don't get it wrong!

Credits:

Art and placeholder code: https://ldjam.com/users/dry-squid
Code and placeholder art: https://ldjam.com/users/organicpencil
Music and sound effects: https://ldjam.com/users/stone-pacifier
